p.s: As I am watching outside the window I think about what Nick could possibly want from me.
Obviously I am very pleased to see him, it has been way totoo long since the last time but why was I supposed to come alone?
As the car arrives and Nick helps me to get out, I whisper into his ear Are you in love with me?Or why did I have to come alone? as a joke.
I smile at his response and do as he says, send Ferdie, the drive away.
When we enter, Nick says that something is funny, to my question what it is that's funny he gives no response.
Instead our conversation is interrupted by a knock on the door.
While Nick leaves to answer the door I go ahead into the living room.
A minute later I hear steps, I want to ask Nick who it was on the door but as I look up there is no sign of Nick.
Instead there is a tall blonde man standing in the door.
I can't believe what I see.
Could it be...?
No, why would he be here at NicksNick's place.
As he moves closer I can get a better look at him and I realise it really is him.
My heart starts pounding heavily and I feel dizzy, how long has it been 4 years?
I don't know what to say, there he is Jay Gatsby the former love of my livelife.
He looks at me but does not say anything so I say: I certainly am so awfully glad to see you again.
He doesn't responserespond which makes me feel uneasy, when Nick enters the akwardawkward silence has been going on for way totoo long.
We do not really start a conversation, only short sentences and responses.
Jay tells me that in November it will be five yeats since we last saw each other.
I feel that each of us feels uncertain and does not know what to do.
A housekeeper brings us teetea, it tastes nice but shortly after Nick wants to go and Jay follows him.
Now I'm alone with my thoughts even though I cannot think straight.
I hear murmuring and I think that now I know why I was supossedsupposed to come alone.
A few minutes later Jay reenters without Nick.
He sits down across me on the sofa and starts talking.
He tells me about his life and how everything he has done was to win me back some day.
He tells me that he loves me and wants us to start a new life together.
I sit there and listen and slowly tears start falling down my cheeks.
Jay takes my hand and I hold it, he gives me warmth and hope but also confuses me.
I tell him about my life about how in the last minute I was thinking about not marrying Tom because of him.
About my beautiful little daughter and how often I thoughthought about reaching out to him.
Time flies and when Nick suddenly comes back I don't want him to see me cry.
I wipe my tears away and listen to Jay excitingly talking to Nick.
I have to smile because I realise how much I have missed him and as he invites me and Nick over to his house I'm excited about what I will see.
As we leave the room and NicksNick's house and walk over to Jay's house, he takes my hand and I take his.
